resources.string: DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE, HARYANA
कृषि और किसान कल्याण विभाग, हरियाणा
Mobile number is required/मोबाइल नंबर की आवश्यकता है
Family Id is required/परिवार की पहचान आवश्यक है
10 digit valid mobile number is required/10 अंकों का वैध मोबाइल नंबर आवश्यक है
Invalid mobile number/मोबाइल नंबर अमान्य है
Otp is required/ओटीपी की आवश्यकता है
This app is used to verify crops
The major benefit of this app is to provide proper transparency between farmer crops and their selling.
Major facilities available are providing reports of submissions and latest notifications to farmers.
If this survey is properly done then best schemes can be implemented for the farmers welfare.
